column4: So... anyone here ever formatted their ext partition to fat32 by mistake?
fortunately not. Why, is that what happened to you?
at the moment, i am completely and utterly screwed.
oh, that was my next question, how did you format...
unfortunately, I don't think there's much you can do, except employ forensic experts for thousands of <insert your favorite currency unit>
there are a number of excellent resources available
unfortunately i'm not sure which to pick
oh, so you just came here to chat about it.
sort of -- i have a deadline at 8:30am
so i'm trying to find someone who has been through this and can help me get through without getting me fired
surely, if they're vital, the ones on the ext3 weren't the only copies?!
no, I know, you've set the stakes to high
maybe that's the first thing to do: get your deadline extended
